This sweater is soft and cozy. The navy is more of a dark royal blue, but very flattering.

评论概述: Lovely little cardigan for the money
评论详情: I ordered this sweater in small, camel color with gold buttons. I did not have any issues with the buttonholes not being surged. The buttons themselves appear to be metal of some kind. I found the sweater to be true to size. I am 5'3", 36B, 125 lbs. and the small fit me perfectly being able to button the sweater completely without any pulling across the bust. The sweater can be worn casual or dressed up a bit and doubtful anyone will guess you paid under 20.00 for it. Overall, I am very pleased with the purchase.

5'4" - 205lbs - XL - I saw some of the negative reviews and was hesitatant to purchase. So glad I purchased! The cardigan is beautiful,  soft, and comfy. It fits true to size and is very flattering. The material isn't super thick, so it's not to bulky. My only concern, and it's minor, is that the buttons could have been secured better. But, all the buttons are on and they look nice. If one does fall off at a later date it's easily sewn back on. This cardigan was worth the money. I'd 10 out of 10 buy again.
I’m 5’3” and love the way this cardigan fits. It’s very soft and true to size. Buttons are functional. The texture is nice, thick but not hot. Very nice quality and worth the cost.

Love this sweater, not only is it very soft to touch, it looks like it is very expensive. I’ve received compliments every time I’ve worn it. I bought a Small, am 5’2 and 115lbs. It is mid-weight, I wore a tear under it. Could be shorter to appear more cropped but I’m fine with it. I didn’t give this 5 stars as I wasn’t very happy with how it washed (following label). I the yarn/knitting did not  come out with as nice of a finish.
I usually fit this size but this color runs big. I retuned it but still have not get my refund.
This sweater is extremely soft yet holds its shape well. It is professional looking and can be worn buttoned or over a blouse or shirt.
flattering and classic looks.  I am 5'10" 150 lbs and the small fit great.
But soft, comfortable and washable. I love it.
Very cute, trendy, fits well, is warm as well as soft and great quality for the price.

Perfect sweater for work. The material is soft and not too thin or heavy. If you're looking for a structured jacket this isn't it but if you're looking for an upscale cardigan this is the one for you! Upsize if you want a more loose/longer fit.

It's a rare day when my husband compliments something I'm wearing (not because he's a jerk, but because I wear the same thing all the time! LOL). But, when I put this new sweater on, he went out of his way to tell me that I looked cute in it, which is true, because I did. It is a comfortable sweater and warm, but not too hot that you can't wear a long sleeve under in the winter heated areas. This sweater would be great with either jeans or nicer pants or even some dresses. I'm a fan!

评论概述: Great quality, perfect fit, lots of compliments
评论详情: Amazon clothes can be hit or miss on unknown brands, but this looked and felt so good on me that I just jumped online to buy three more variations.  I got so many compliments on it.  Only change I would make is I would swap out the buttons with something that looks a bit more expensive.  But I find it isn't really necessary.Love it!  May come back for even more.  It's perfect for work, evening out, etc.

评论概述: So glad I ordered this sweater!
评论详情: I can't begin to say how pleased I am with this purchase.  The sweater looks great on, and the feel of the knit fabric is amazingly soft and silky to the touch.  The buttons are cute and classy, the pockets are real (not just a flap sewn on for looks), and the fit is perfect (I am 5'2", 114 lbs., and ordered an XS).  I love the tweedy fabric, and the black and white combo (almost a hound's tooth check) is really a stepped-up look.  I am going to wear this a lot; I'm actually thinking about ordering a second, in the exact same style/color.  Well worth the money.

It was very wrinkled and I had to steam iron it.  The buttons are golden and shiny, which looks cheap.  The sweater itself fits nicely, but the material is thinner than I thought.  I just wish it had different buttons that are less gaudy looking.

This is a nicely styled sweater—I wouldn’t call it a jacket—that I got a little bigger than my normal size. It fits and buttons—if I got my normal size, it might have gapped when buttoned, which is why I sized up. The material is a good thickness but seems a little cheap—not sure about the durability of this item for that reason, though there are no loose seams or threads. Overall, though, it looks good and is comfortable to wear. A good piece that replicates a high-end classic on a budget.
Just not for me. Too bulky for small frame.

I chose this cardigan in the green color, I loved the way the golden button against the green sweater looked. I am glad I chose green because the sweater is so beautiful in person.  The sweater is soft and looks great when worn.  The sweater is machine wash only so be aware before purchasing.

This sweater came wadded up in a ball, looked worn, button holes stretched and entire body stretched like a large person wore it. The really bad part I returned but they Refused Return! So I’m out the price of the sweater!!! Don’t buy! Rip off!!!

This OFEEFAN Womens Cardigan Sweater looks the same on, and in person, as it does in the sales description photos. I wasn't expecting it to be as soft, and lightweight as it actually is, but it really does feel comfortable. The fit is a bit too boxy, and baggy for me, so maybe a medium would fit me better. Seems to be decent quality, and I like the texture of the fabric.
The material felt like rayon. The style was boxy, the arms weee different lengths, the buttons were cheap. The overall quality was really bad. Not at all what I had hoped for. Returned immediately.

This is one of those classic cardigans you should have in your closet. It's very versatile. The fabric is a medium weight but doesn't make you too warm. Could be worn anytime of the year or when layering for that classic look. 10/10

Fits well, looks classy.

评论概述: Nice sweater - could be some small quality improvements made
评论详情: I have a long torso and am a true size 8. I ordered the M in this sweater and it fits nicely. The fabric is surprisingly extremely soft and it held up well in a hand wash. My only small sticking point is that the fabric gapes a little between buttons, especially during wear even though it fits me a little on the large size. I think it's because the fabric is so stretchy and forgiving, which is great everywhere else in the sweater but it feels like there should be something a tad sturdier behind the buttons. I may try to add some sturdy fabric strip on the button side to see if that helps, but overall it's adorable and worth the money!

This is very soft and semi-cropped.. It falls just a couple of inches below my waist (I am 5’6”, 145 lbs and have small boobs, ordered a medium) and will button closed but looks better worn open because the fit is close to my body. Order up a size if you want to button it or are chesty.

评论概述: Love it but should be advertised as a cardigan
评论详情: Taking one star off for the sole reason that this is a bit falsely advertised. It’s not a true tweed material nor does it have the structure one might presume when purchasing a “jacket”. What it is is an extremely soft and polished-looking button-down cardigan sweater. It is so cozy and such a great fit, at least prior to washing. I just think the way it’s marketed gives a false impression if you are looking for more of a true, stiffer tweed and the structure of a jacket. Purchased in the light blue color and can see myself stretching this to be a truly 4-season option that works across several different settings and occasions. Misleading titles aside - and assuming it holds up well after a cold hand water wash and drying flat - it’s a 10/10.

评论概述: Cozy Sweater, perfect for Casual Office Days
评论详情: This cardigan is exactly what I was looking for on casual days at the office. It’s soft, cozy, and lightweight, yet warm enough for cooler days. The fabric blend makes it comfortable to wear, and it pairs perfectly with jeans for a stylish but relaxed look. I love how versatile it is , great for work or even just a casual outing. It's one of my preferred seaters for office. Reviewed by Handyman's wife
Was worried it might be a stiff knit material but it's actually really soft. XS was still pretty roomy. Warm and worth the price.
The cardigan is soft and comfortable. True to size.

The sweater was beautiful and well made….EXCEPT for the button holes: they were not surged and look like raw cut fabric. Would have had to be worn buttoned. And I was afraid they would fray. True to size.
Didn’t like the fact they had a narrow toe bed.

I have worn this sweater buttoned up as a shirt, open and as pictured with a dress. It is so soft and cozy. The gold detail elevates outfits instantly. It is TTS. The quality is fantastic and it falls nicely on my shoulders and to my hips. The sleeves are a little long on me, but I am short. So, I am used to cuffing sleeves. They held the cuff all day.

Very cute, very light - it does snag on jewelry. Great sweater for fall and spring.
Very soft, nice quality material, good fit, versatile design and great colour.
